oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Three-port rectangular microstrip unequal power divider and coupler
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAY, S
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: combiner
rectangular microstrip powder divider
coupler
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new configuration of a three-port rectangular microstrip power divider and coupler has been proposed. It can easily implement unequal power division of a large ratio, i.e., the power coupled to the third port can vary from -3 to -26 dB. The configuration has been analyzed using a transmission-line model, as well as method-of-moments-based software. (C) 2001 , Inc.
